languages.text: {n}Мужчина хрипло смеется.{/n} "Ты едва понимаешь, о чем говоришь, правда? Ты мог{mf||ла} убить смертную оболочку Зари. Но пророчица — много больше, чем тело. Однажды ты встретишь ее второй, грозный облик — и поймешь, сколь глупым было твое торжество".

{n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина хрипло смеется.{/n} "Ты едва понимаешь, о чем говоришь, правда? Ты мог{mf||ла} убить смертную оболочку Зари. Но пророчица — много больше, чем тело. Однажды ты встретишь ее второй, грозный облик — и поймешь, сколь глупым было твое торжество".

traits.locale_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You could have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

{n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You could have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

{n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

{n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

{n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

languages.text: {n}他声嘶力竭地大笑起来。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说什么蠢话，不是吗？或许你确实杀死了‘极光’的凡胎肉身，但那位女先知可不仅仅只是个肉身。总有一天，你会遭遇她更加可怕的样子。到了那时，你便会意识到你的胜利是多么愚不可及。”
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}他声嘶力竭地大笑起来。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说什么蠢话，不是吗？或许你确实杀死了‘极光’的凡胎肉身，但那位女先知可不仅仅只是个肉身。总有一天，你会遭遇她更加可怕的样子。到了那时，你便会意识到你的胜利是多么愚不可及。”

languages.text: {n}彼は声を荒げて笑う。{/n}「自分が何を言っているのか、まるで分かっていない。お前はオーロラの死すべき殻を殺したかもしれない。しかし、預言者はその肉体をはるかに超えた存在なのだ。いつか、彼女のもう一つの恐ろしい姿に出会って、そして、自分の勝利の愚かさを知るだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は声を荒げて笑う。 {/n}「お前は自分が何を言っているのか、まるで分かっていない。お前はオーロラの死すべき殻を殺したかもしれない。しかし、預言者はその肉体をはるかに超えた存在なのだ。いつか、彼女のもう一つの恐ろしい姿に出会うだろう。そして、自分の勝利の愚かさを知るだろう」
{n}彼は声を荒げて笑う。{/n}「自分が何を言っているのか、まるで分かっていない。お前はオーロラの死すべき殻を殺したかもしれない。しかし、預言者はその肉体をはるかに超えた存在なのだ。いつか、彼女のもう一つの恐ろしい姿に出会って、そして、自分の勝利の愚かさを知るだろう」

languages.text: {n}Er lacht heiser.{/n} "Ihr wisst überhaupt nicht, wovon Ihr sprecht, oder? Ihr habt vielleicht Auroras sterbliche Hülle getötet. Aber die Prophetin ist weitaus mehr als ihr Körper. Eines Tages werdet Ihr ihrer anderen, furchterregenden Form begegnen – und erkennen, wie lächerlich Euer Triumph war."
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lacht heiser.{/n} "Ihr wisst überhaupt nicht, wovon Ihr sprecht, oder? Ihr habt vielleicht Auroras sterbliche Hülle getötet. Aber die Prophetin ist weitaus mehr als ihr Körper. Eines Tages werdet Ihr ihrer anderen, furchterregenden Form begegnen – und erkennen, wie lächerlich Euer Triumph war."

languages.text: {n}Il éclate d'un rire rauque.{/n} « Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce que vous racontez, n'est-ce pas ? Vous avez certes tué l'enveloppe charnelle d'Aurore. Mais la prophétesse est bien plus que cela. Un jour, vous ferez face à son autre forme redoutable... et vous réaliserez alors la vacuité de votre triomphe. »
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il éclate d'un rire rauque.{/n} « Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce que vous racontez, n'est-ce pas ? Vous avez certes tué l'enveloppe charnelle d'Aurore. Mais la prophétesse est bien plus que cela. Un jour, vous ferez face à son autre forme redoutable... et vous réaliserez alors la vacuité de votre triomphe. »

languages.text: {n}Se ríe con una carcajada seca.{/n} «No sabes de qué estás hablando, ¿verdad? Puede que hayas acabado con el cuerpo mortal de Aurora, pero la profetisa es mucho más que eso. Un día conocerás a su otra forma, la aterradora, y entonces comprenderás la ridiculez de tu triunfo».
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se ríe con una carcajada seca.{/n} «No sabes de qué estás hablando, ¿verdad? Puede que hayas acabado con el cuerpo mortal de Aurora, pero la profetisa es mucho más que eso. Un día conocerás a su otra forma, la aterradora, y entonces comprenderás la ridiculez de tu triunfo».

languages.text: {n}Boğuk sesle bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Neden bahsettiğini dahi bilmiyorsun, değil mi? Aurora'nın fâni bedenini öldürmüş olabilirsin ama Peygamber, bir bedenden çok daha fazlasıdır. Bir gün onun diğer, korkunç hâliyle karşılaşacak ve zaferinin ne denli aptalca olduğunu anlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}He laughs hoarsely.{/n} "You barely know what you're talking about, don't you? You may have killed Aurora's mortal shell. But the Prophetess is far more than her body. One day, you will meet her other, fearsome form — and you will know the sheer folly of your triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Boğuk sesle bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Neden bahsettiğini dahi bilmiyorsun, değil mi? Aurora'nın fâni bedenini öldürmüş olabilirsin ama Peygamber, bir bedenden çok daha fazlasıdır. Bir gün onun diğer, korkunç hâliyle karşılaşacak ve zaferinin ne denli aptalca olduğunu anlayacaksın."
